es.usal.bicoverlapper.kernel
Class Session

java.lang.Object
  es.usal.bicoverlapper.kernel.Session

public class Session
extends java.lang.Object

Class that manages the current state of data, sending and retrieving this information of the interaction with active Diagramas. By now, four sources of data are being supported:

1) MultidimensionalData: expression level data taken as multidimensional data, for ParallelCoordinates

2) HeatmapData: more detailed, prefuse oriented data for Heatmap (newer versions will fuse it with 1))

3) BiclusterData: biclusters found data

4) TRNData: transcription network data

Author:
Javier Molpeceres and Rodrigo Santamaria

Returns the data layer of this Session TODO: NOTE: The data layer is a typical multidimensional variables dataLayer As such, only the expression levels are considered in this way, being genes (samples) variables, and conditions (experiments) dimensions
